subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: With Justine Henin’s decision to retire at age 25 and Kim Clijsters’s decision to retire last year at age 23, Belgian tennis has been thrust most abruptly into a new, less golden era.
snippet: With Justine Henin’s decision to retire at age 25 and Kim Clijsters’s decision to retire last year at age 23, Belgian tennis has been thrust most abruptly into a new, less golden era.
